column3:
How to use this sheet: This sheet is designed to allow you to track your progress.  
Once you have mastered a grammar point or vocabulary / kanji  change the selector in Yes and your progress percentage will update
This is a read only version - go to FILE > MAKE A COPY to download to your own google drive
to take a lesson or test

column2: コンピュータ/コンピューター

column3: usually, or a train that stops at every station
to get dark,to come to an end
(respectful) to be,to come or to go
to boil, to grow hot,to get excited
calling on someone who is ill,enquiry
to be reserved, to be restrained
to change between buses or trains
not at all (used with a negative verb)
not entirely (used in a negative sentence)
limited express train (faster than an express train)
